img.@alt: 1 | verb | to lag or linger behind 2 | verb | go after with the intent to catch 3 | verb | move, proceed, or walk draggingly or slowly 4 | verb | hang down so as to drag along the ground 5 | verb | drag loosely along a surface; allow to sweep the ground 6 | noun | a track or mark left by something that has passed 7 | noun | a path or track roughly blazed through wild or hilly country 8 | noun | evidence pointing to a possible solution (8 meanings)

subpod.plaintext:
1 | verb | to lag or linger behind
2 | verb | go after with the intent to catch
3 | verb | move, proceed, or walk draggingly or slowly
4 | verb | hang down so as to drag along the ground
5 | verb | drag loosely along a surface; allow to sweep the ground
6 | noun | a track or mark left by something that has passed
7 | noun | a path or track roughly blazed through wild or hilly country
8 | noun | evidence pointing to a possible solution
